attributes.review: I downloaded this app about a week ago and it was all cool and stuff but then it started to glitch and then a timer popped up and it said 5 days 3 hours 19 minutes and 24 seconds. I didnâ€™t know what it meant but then weird things started happening my lights were being shut off and I kept seeing these weird scratches every where on my body then I saw it the huge shadow figure staring at me. It had said 3 more days to live. Of course I started to freak out so I tried to delete the app but it didnâ€™t work I kept trying and trying but it didnâ€™t work. Today is my last day I have 10 hours 53 minutes 49 seconds. This world was a cruel world. Goodbye forever. Thank you for reading this. Ps donâ€™t vote for the orangeğŸŠ
attributes.title: Appreciate

attributes.review: This was the worst experience I have ever had with a mobile app. I expected much more for an app made by government officials. It is extremely sluggish and crashes when I try to do certain actions. It also needs a custom video player interface because using the built in video player is extremely annoying for videos that are over one hour long. The app also unnecessarily collects your personal information when registering for activities in the â€œengageâ€ portion of the app. The customer service is also terrible and they never responded in my attempts to contact them within the app. My issues remain unresolved and they do not care at all about the users of this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.review: THIS APP MADE MY MERMAID DIE!!! I was walking home from school, on my bike, headed to work, ok! But all of a sudden I hear the conk shell from my mermaids fish tank. So I drove home in my combine, and when I got to the store, I saw the chicken running with a jar in itâ€™s hands. So I bought my yellow, and went back to the park so I could go to bed. But then my mermaid came running after me! His horns grew at least ten feet longer and I started running inside of my car. Eventually I made it to the gym where I started going to the bathroom, when this orange turtle came in with a sword and slaughtered my monkey mermaid!!! This all happened right after I downloaded the app and it is AWFUL!!! If I could give it 0 stars, I would. DO NOT GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT TO HAVE A CRAZY STORY LIKE MINE!!!
